attributes.action: Limit the numbers of Polish moving to the UK from Poland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The numbers of polish nationals arriving in the UK now vastly out numbers any of those arriving from other EU and non EU countries. Statistics show that crime,particularly violent and driving related crimes, in certain parts of the country has doubled or trebled due to the influx of the Polish. Police reports uphold this. Translation services are costing taxpayers millions and it is now proven that nearly 85% of new jobs
in the UK have gone to immigrants over the last few years. Health services and housing is straining at the seams and there is no end in sight. Start with limiting those who are,by virtue of numbers causing the greatest problems. Statistically that is the Polish.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
